content.title: The Arena of the Crimson King

scenes.intro_text: You stand before two colossal brass doors, humming with a deep red energy. The air smells of ozone and rust. An inscription above the gate reads: 'Only fury may enter.' There is no handle, no lock, only a solid, imposing barrier between you and the trial ahead.

challenge.description: Channel your strength and strike the door's central seal at the precise moment it glows brightest to shatter the magical barrier.

scenes.intro_text: The doors grind open into a circular chamber. In the center, a pressure plate is surrounded by four stone statues of mythical beasts: a Serpent, a Wolf, a Bear, and an Eagle. As you step inside, the statues grind to life, their eyes glowing malevolently. The far door is sealed tight, with a carving above it depicting the same four beasts in a specific sequence.

challenge.description: The door will only open if the statues are defeated in the correct order depicted on the archway: Serpent, Wolf, Bear, Eagle. Defeating them out of sequence causes them all to regenerate.

scenes.intro_text: Beyond the statue room lies a deep, dark chasm, fifty feet across. A howling wind rushes up from its depths. On the far side, you can see the ornate entrance to the throne room. A narrow, crumbling stone bridge, slick with moss, is the only obvious way across, but it looks incredibly unstable.

challenge.description: You can either risk the treacherous, crumbling bridge or attempt a powerful, running leap to clear the chasm in one go. The ledge on the other side is narrow.

scenes.intro_text: You enter a grand, torch-lit hall. At the far end, a hulking figure in jagged, crimson armor sits on a throne of obsidian. He rises slowly, grabbing a massive, two-handed axe. 'You have strength,' his voice booms from his helmet. 'But you lack the will to rule. Prove me wrong.'

challenge.name: The Crimson King
challenge.description: The King is a relentless attacker. His armor is nearly impenetrable, but a glowing sigil on his chestplate flashes whenever he prepares a powerful overhead swing, briefly exposing his only weak point.
challenge.hint_text: Dodge his heavy attacks and counter-strike the glowing sigil on his chestplate to deal significant damage.
